body:
Depends on #28786

This PR does a sweep of Bioconductor R packages in Spack, and does the
following:

- add new versions of packages for bioconductor 3.14
- make sure the bioc attribute is set
- add new packages as required

Due to adding the bioc attribute, almost all R bioconductor packages had
changes. Since almost all packages were being touched, I also tried to
standardize the formatting of the packages.

- make sure there is a short and long description
- have dependencies specified in the same order as in the DESCRIPTION
  file
- place when directives at the end

Having consistency makes it easier to process these in bulk. The process
is script driven but requires interaction. I am hopeful that the
consistent formatting will allow for further automation. All of the
packages in this PR were built with gcc-10.3.0 prior to submitting the
PR.
title: update bioconductor packages to bioconductor 3.14
